means: 禁止，阻止( prohibit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Minicabs are prohibited by law from touting passers-by for business.
sentence.Network_cn: 无标志的预约型出租车沿街拉客是非法的。

sentence.Network_en: The tourists are prohibited from getting on the island.
sentence.Network_cn: 旅游者被禁止登上那个小岛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 严禁衣履不整英文_百度知道 ... Appearance = 外表 Prohibited = 严禁 Unkempt = 不整洁.
abraded的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... samarskite 铌钇矿... prohibited 被禁止的... laminectomy 椎板切除术.
in order to identify the ultimate recipients of prohibited merchandise ., 目的是为了发现违禁货物的最终收货人.

list.abs: 物流英语 - 外贸实务 ... transhipment permited 允许转运 transhipment prohibited 不许转运 transit shipment 转运，中转.
prohibitive 禁止的prohibitive inhibition 超限抑制project 投射
新西兰留学禁止及无须携带物品|启德新闻 ... 免带物品 Unnecessary items 禁携物品 Prohibited items 违禁毒品 Illegal drugs.
出国旅游常用英语一览表_51766旅游网 ... Cash 现金 Prohibited articles 违禁品 Yellow card 健康卡.

entry.def: If a law or someone in authority prohibits something, they forbid it or make it illegal.

example.ex: ...a law that prohibits tobacco advertising in newspapers and magazines...
example.tran: 禁止在报刊杂志上刊登香烟广告的法律

sentences.sentence: "in our house dancing and playing cards were out"

auth_sentence.content: The arts of magic and divination were strictly prohibited.
auth_sentence.res_content: The arts of magic and divination were strictly prohibited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The arts of magic and divination were strictly prohibited.

auth_sentence.content: Nobody is exploiting minerals or any other prohibited action.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nobody is exploiting minerals or any other prohibited action.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nobody is exploiting minerals or any other prohibited action.

auth_sentence.content: I forgot - biologists are prohibited from asking WHY?
auth_sentence.res_content: I forgot - biologists are prohibited from asking WHY?
